name: Shizuku
storyline: When one of his classmates suddenly goes mad in the middle of the class, the protagonist's uncle, one of the teachers in the school asks him to investigate this matter after school. He starts the investigation with the help of one of the girls from his class, an investigation that will lead them to many horrors...
summary: Shizuku is an adult visual novel by Leaf originally released for PC on January 26, 1996. It is the first game to be marketed as a visual novel.
